modName: Protected Merchants-Safe From Vampire And Dragon Attacks
summary:
Have merchants dying from vampire and dragon attacks often? This mod sets merchants in Skyrim to Protected, they will no longer die during vampire and dragon attacks, unless you kill them yourself :)
Mod does not use scripts.
descriptionHtml:
This mod sets merchants from cities and villages to Protected, they will no longer die during vampire and dragon attacks, I always had Belethor and Adrianne dying from vampire attacks, Alvor dying from dragon attacks and sometimes other merchants died as well, so I decided to stop that. You can still kill them yourself if you need to, in order to get a high profile target for Volkihar quests, Â or for any other reason. Mod is simple and has no scripts whatsoever.

Requirements:

Skyrim 1.9

Installation:

Extract the archive and copy EssentialMerchants.esp to Skyrim/Data

Uninstallation:

Delete EssentialMerchants.esp
author: Darth Sidious
